root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 3-5-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Target 3.5: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
Cible 3.5 : Renforcer la prévention et le traitement de la toxicomanie (abus de substances psychoactives), notamment l'abus de stupéfiants et la consommation nocive d’alcool
